attr.title: F-Zero Pocket
attr.desc: The call has echoed throughout the universe once again: the F-Zero Grand Prix is back! Select one of the 30 most skillful drivers of all-time and boost your way to the top in F-Zero Pocket, a racing fan-game made as a tribute to both the GameBoy Color and the F-Zero series. 20 tracks divided in 4 cups and 4 levels of difficulty: are you up to the task?
attr.inst: Download the game at https://linky439.itch.io/f-zero-pocket and unzip the Tracks folder and the EXE to the f-zeropocket/gamedata folder. An install script will take care of the rest.
